title: Thit Kho – Caramelized Braised Pork and Eggs
directions: Hard boil eggs and set aside.
Cut pork into 1″ x 2″ pieces and set aside.
In a pot, add the sugar and stir until it melts (add in a tablespoon of water if necessary).
Cook sugar till it turns a deep golden hue.
Add in pork and cook for 3-5 minutes on medium-heat until meat is coated with caramel.
Add in pepper and fish sauce.
Turn the heat to low and stir the pork for 5 minutes to absorb the flavors.
Add coconut juice and bring to boil.
Cover and cook on medium heat for 45 minutes or longer.
Adjust the seasoning to taste before serving.
